title: Longitudinal Changes of [18F]PI-2620 Positron Emission Tomography in Subjectives With Cognitively Normal, Mild Cognitive Impairment and Alzheimer's Disease
description_brief: The overall goal of this imaging trial is to evaluate crosssectional difference and longitudinal changes of \[18F\]PI-2620, a tau targeted positron emission computed tomography radioligand, in cognitively normal individuals, and subjects with mild cognitive impairment and Alzheimer's disease.
explanation_target: Reason: The trial tests [18F]PI-2620 as a positron-emission tomography (PET) radioligand to image tau pathology in cognitively normal, MCI, and Alzheimer’s disease subjects — the intervention is diagnostic imaging of tau, not a therapeutic agent. citeturn0search3turn0search2
